title: Blue essence emporium Nov 2019
body:
Seeing a few sources saying that BEE is live as of today but I cant see any chromas in the shop available for BE. 

Am I missing something?

replies.body: The localised pach notes (that is, ours and not NAs) list the 26th. Whether it's at midnight, 3am~ or 11am~ (as other such releases have been in the past) I couldn't say, but it should be up by tomorrow afternoon.

I just did some checking into the patch notes for other regions, and based on the fact that Japan (GMT+9) lists it as 26th, while Garena (GMT +8) lists it as 25th, I think it's safe to assume that the Essence Emporium will be available at about 3am AEDT (GMT +11).

Generally speaking, it's fairly safe to assume the date *after* what's stated for things being released if it's not clear if the date/time has been localised for OCE/Aus, as you'll either be pleasantly surprised or right on the correct date.

> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=r0NUuJH8,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-11-25T06:52:05.056+0000)
>
> Seeing a few sources saying that BEE is live as of today but I cant see any chromas in the shop available for BE. 
> 
> Am I missing something?

Dont worry it will probably be up in some hours{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} {{sticker:katarina-love}}
